name: DowntownCornerstoneChurchSermons
0:
”Alexa, open D. C. C. Sermons”
”Alexa, ask D. C. C. Sermons for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start D. C. C. Sermons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. c. c. sermons
des:
Listen to the latest sermons from Downtown Cornerstone Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can also say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. To play the previous or next episodes, say "Alexa, previous" or "Alexa, next". 

To listen online or find out more about Downtown Cornerstone Church, visit www.downtowncornerstone.org.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
